title: Nomination of Cabinet Spokesmen
decision_details:
It was decided to appoint the following Members of the Cabinet to function as Co-Cabinet Spokesmen.
	
	*	Hon. (Dr.) Bandula Gunawardena
		Minister of Transport and Highways
		Minister of Mass Media

	*	Hon. Mahinda Amaraweera
		Minister of Agriculture
			Minister of Wildlife & Forest Resources Conservation

	*	Hon. Kanchana Wijesekera
		Minister of Power and Energy

	*	Hon. Manusha Nanayakkara
		Minister of Labour and Foreign Employment
